short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A cute little dinosaur that follows your mouse around!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dino pets! Have a tiny blue Dino follow your mouse around, watch it run and chase your mouse down as you browse around the internet!

NOTE: Go to a different tab and refresh your page after install to activate!
